sentences.sContent: As described above, antioxidants help prevent the destruction of cells in our body that can lead to cataracts, glaucoma, varicose veins, hemorrhoids, peptic ulcers, heart disease and cancer.
sentences.sContent_eng: As described above, antioxidants help prevent the destruction of cells in our body that can lead to cataracts, glaucoma, varicose veins, hemorrhoids, peptic ulcers, heart disease and cancer.
sentences.sCn: 正如上面所述，抗氧化剂能帮助预防体内细胞毁灭所导致的白内障、青光眼、静脉曲张、痔疮、胃溃疡、心脏病和癌症。

trans.tranCn: 助消化的, 胃蛋白酶的
trans.tranOther: of, relating to, or promoting digestion
